title: A Brave Little Lion
story_text: Once upon a time, there was a brave little lion named Leo. Leo loved to explore the jungle and make new friends. One day, he found a hidden cave filled with sparkling gems.
lesson: Courage is not the absence of fear, but the triumph over it.

title: The Wise Old Owl
story_text: Oliver the Owl sat high in the oak tree. He watched over the forest every night. All the animals came to Oliver for advice because he was the wisest bird in the land.
lesson: Listening is the key to wisdom.
